title: Inquiry about Final Bill after Move-Out
description: A customer who recently moved out is calling to ask about their final bill, which seems high.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's closed account and the final bill details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates the final bill.

tasks.description: Explain the components of the final bill, including the prorated final usage and the application of their initial deposit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly breaks down the final charges and credits.

tasks.description: Confirm the final balance due or the refund amount to be sent to their forwarding address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent resolves the customer's confusion and confirms the final amount.
